Posts.Content: Hello lovely lady,  I hope your treatment plan is clearer and is going well. Sending bosom bud hug to you.  Bosombud x
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy done

Posts.Content: Hello bosom pals, How's life with you?  I had my 2nd chemotherapy treatment yesterday.  Thank you to the staff and expertise on Cathedral Day unit for care given and taken. We are in good hands, I think.  A friend likens our three week cycle to this week 1 is like feeling like a limp lettuce, week 2 - we are in spring onion phase and week 3-broccoli week getting up strength for next chemo treatment.  So I am back in the limp lettuce week -cheering all fellow limp lettuces on from my sofa!
Posts.Title: 2nd chemo treatment done.

Posts.Content: PS- am  opting for a wig as a hopefully  ier hair option. Will be wearing  hats etc as well.   See how I go. Anyone else on a hair loss etc experience as well?
Posts.Title: 2nd chemo treatment done.
